long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extension which replaces your new tab screen with a minimalistic life calendar. Each dot represents a week. There are 52 rows of dots representing 52 weeks in a year, and 80 columns representing an 80-year life span. After inputting your birthday it will fill the calendar showing how many weeks you have currently lived. Each week a new dot will be filled in.

Features
-Lightweight minimalistic life calendar
-Light and dark themes
-Optional clock
-Responsive design suitable for both landscape and portrait monitors
